review_data.title: Dinner
review_data.content: We stayed a few feet away from this restaurant so found it easy. If you are a Vegetarian or Vegan then you must visit this restaurant because they only serve Vegetarian food. We found the manager very friendly and helpful. They have so many dishes...More

review_data.title: One of our must stop by places in Zurich
review_data.content: Having eaten heavily with meats and such over the festive period Hiltl is a must for a meal. The quality is very good and the choice is incredibly wide. Take what you can eat and pay by the weight at many efficient cashier stations. Restaurant...More

review_data.title: Super Erlebnis und sehr Empfehlenswert
review_data.content: Cooles Einführung in die Geschichte von Hiltl vor es zum Kochen ging. Einfach erklärt - und alles zur Hand. Gute...More

review_data.title: Sehr empfehlenswert!
review_data.content: Sehr feines, vielfältig, frisches Essen! Kreative Getränke, sehr nettes freundliches Personal tipptopp 👍🏻
